channel.title: Can't get Moparscape to run in Linux Fedora Core 6
channel.description: When I try to get Moparscape to run in Fedora Core 6 by using the shellscript all i get is a bunch of errors. When I try to run the jar file manually by typing java -jar -noverify MoparScape.jar it starts the program for about 3 seconds then kills it. Any help here would be appreciated. (P.S. I don't know if this should be posted here. If not then I am sorry.)

item.title: Can't get Moparscape to run in Linux Fedora Core 6
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Download java! > java.com
Download JDK SE > go to google type in “jdk Download” it should be the first link on java’s site.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't get Moparscape to run in Linux Fedora Core 6
item.dc:creator: @MoparLinux MoparLinux
item.description:
@MoparLinux wrote:

As far as I know, I just have the JRE 1.5.0_11 and Java’s website says that is the latest version.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2007, 05:16:23 PM[/size][hr]I am trying to download it now. Sorry, I didn’t know that was a requirement. Back when I was running Windows XP, I got MoparScape running w/ out it. (Stupid mistake. Especially since I am a member of both the SDN (Sun Developers Network) and MSDN (Microsoft Developers Network)

Read full topic
